Hi Greg,


on linux mkisofs should do the job, on Mac you might try disk utility. 
But - a compressed tar would be better. It also gives an one-file 
download, but I can just untar it, in the likely case that I do not want 
to burn it to a CD (I am working hard to get rid of these silly medias 
that tend to break or get lost as soon as I get them into my hands ;-) )...


CU Lars.
